title: Support for Dev UI in remote-dev mode.
body:
### Description

Currently the Dev UI throws 404 in remote-dev mode.
 
Did see that this has been explicitly disabled as mentioned in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/22780#issuecomment-1009283722




### Implementation ideas

Continuing the thoughts in the comment, to possibly enable it based on some configuration settings.
For security enforcements, may be 
- configuration requiring  ip cidrs for source networks to access the dev ui,  
- otp generation in the pod/container running in dev mode, such that that password can grant access to the dev ui through browser, so only some one who would have access to the pod can generate the otp through exec and subsequently access the dev ui from the browser.
